favourite.article: God needs the overcomers!
Make us the overcomers, Christ's bride, and God's ageturners. Make us those who consummate the age! Amen!

Recently enjoyed this hymn in All India National College and young working conference, Chennai. After singing this hymn I also have deepest plea to the Lord that He should gain overcomers who can fulfill His economy, His dreams and desire. Amen!!!

Wow.. I was so touched that this song is talking about a corporate matter. The Lord needs all the members of His body to be His overcomers! Save us from being individualistic Lord. Make US the overcomers, Your bride and your age-turners. Make US those who consummate the age.
Lord, make us the overcomers!

Amen. Make us Christ's bride and God's age turners. He is the one who lets us overcome, overcome the fall of man!!! I like this line in the hymn: "Make us those who live to turn the age" Oh Lord Jesus!
Amen. God needs overcomers!
Age turners. Lord gain them.

This is a powerful song. I have to sing it at least three times with a stronger spirit each time just to come up to the standard of singing this song. We need songs like this to help us fan our spirits into flame, to not be passive, but strong and active in spirit to resist the oldness and cooperate with the Lord to carry out His move.
God we are willing to be the age turners! Make us those who consummate the age!
Make us those who consummate the age.
God needs the overcomers!
Amen overcomers!

Lord Jesus, I love You. Thank You that You need the overcomers to turn the age for for the fulfillment of Your purpose. I choose to be an overcomer with my family and with all the saints. Please keep our hearts to love You more and more each day. Very wonderful song!
An overcomer is a Jesus lover.

LORD, Thank YOU for John, Paul, Timothy representing YOU on earth. TODAY, Take & Seal us, 1 Cor. 1:30, YOUR corporate vessel, absolutely one spirit with YOU, we say Amen to our Beloved God, YOUR Kingdom come where we are, YOUR will be done where YOU Send us on earth. Rev. 22:17-21:):)
Lord make us Your overcomers! We want You to be the focus of our life. Praise the Lord!
Lovely Song
Amen, God call for the Overcomers.
Lord, make my spirit the same, An overcoming man of God!
God needs the overcomers, our dear Lord Jesus lovers! Make us those who consummate the age!
Lord, we want to be Your overcomers!
